pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Prince Edward Island Premier Dennis King | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Today, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke with Prince Edward Island Premier Dennis King to discuss the railway blockades occurring across the country and the protest that recently took place on the Prince Edward Island side of the Confederation Bridge.

Prime Minister Trudeau expressed the desire to work closely together toward a resolution to the infrastructure disruptions caused by blockades as soon as possible, and thanked Premier King for his continued cooperation. The Prime Minister and the Premier agreed on the importance of resolving the situation quickly and peacefully, and of continuing the dialogue to address underlying issues in the spirit of reconciliation.
